hadiths.text: Muhammad bin 'Ali bin Maimun informed us, he said:"Muhammad -he is, Ibn Yusuf- narrated to us, he said: 'Sufyan narrated to us from Ibn Abi Najih, from Tawus, from a man, from Zaid bin Thabit that the Prophet ruled that the Ruqba belongs to the one to whom it is given

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى ابْنِ أَبِي نَجِيحٍ فِي خَبَرِ زَيْدِ بْنِ ثَابِتٍ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Different Reports From Ibn Abi Najih Concerning The Narration Of Zaid Bin Thabit
